title: Warning Ahead
overview: It tells the story of the ruthless killer Jiang Li, who took root in Shanghai under her anonymity in order to avenge her family for many years. She married Shen Shi You, the owner of a trading company. The two of them live harmoniously, and their love increases, but they are unintentionally involved in more lies and conspiracies... The two confront each other, and the lover becomes the enemy. They are the sweetest couple, but also the strongest opponents. They are evenly matched, falling in love and killing each other.Â
